verbose_text: Inhibition of HIF1alpha activity in LPS / IFNgamma and MSO / IL-10 cells through acriflavine treatment lowered the luciferase reporter signal to the levels of resting (M0) and IL-10 macrophages (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: IFNgamma and MSO/IL-10 cells through acriflavine treatment lowered the luciferase reporter
